comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of Feb 21, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E0DE3DE123FE233A... indicated that exercises would be held that day at Peekskill, NY. Participating was Company F of the 71st Regiment and faculty and students of the New York School of the Line.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content:
N.Y. Nat'l Guard manouevres
s/b: N.Y. Nat'l Guard practice
